Introduction

Shotaro is a Japanese rapper signed under SM Entertainment. He is part of the boy group RIIZE and a former member of the boy group NCT and its sub-unit NCT U.

He was introduced through a V Live broadcast as a new member of NCT on September 23, 2020, along with Sungchan. They joined the group for the album NCT Resonance Pt. 1 and participated in the song “Make A Wish (Birthday Song).”
